Welcome

I am second year PhD student in the Linguistics department at UMass Amherst. I graduated from Swarthmore College in 2014 with a major in Linguistics and a minor in Computer Science. My primary research focus is fieldwork on the semantics of under-documented languages of North America, in particular, Valley Zapotec languages. I am also interested in applying techniques from the study of programming languages to natural language semantics.

Interests

o Natural Language Semantics

o Semantic Fieldwork

o Computational Modeling
